Advair.description: Prevents asthma attacks and worsening of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD)

Belviq.description: Weight loss drug that surpressess appetite and makes you feel full sooner

Celexa.description: Anti-depressant in a group of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs)

Codeine.description: Codeine is an opioid pain medication used to treat mild to moderately severe pain

Effexor.description: Anti-depressant in a group of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs)

Eliquis.description: Helps to prevent platelets in your blood from sticking together and forming a blood clot

Lexapro.description: Anti-depressant in a group of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs)

Lyrica.description: Anti-epileptic drug, also called an anticonvulsant. It works by slowing down impulses in the brain that cause seizures

Naproxin.description: Naproxen is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) that works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body
